original_text: When he got near to the cave, he was very upset. He shouted to Daniel, ‘Daniel, you have continued to worship the living God, as his servant. Was your God able to save you from the lions?’
korean_text: 다니엘이 든 굴에 가까이 이르러서 슬피 소리 질러 다니엘에게 묻되 살아 계시는 하나님의 종 다니엘아 네가 항상 섬기는 네 하나님이 사자들에게서 능히 너를 구원하셨느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: When he got near to the cave
'Daniel, you have continued to worship the living God
Was your God able to save you from the lions?'
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 하나님이 사자들로부터 당신을 구할 수 있었느냐?'
